summary: This is an email chain from March 13, 2024, between attorney Jeanne M. Christensen and an unnamed recipient. Christensen provides background on a victim's case, detailing allegations of sexual abuse orchestrated by the victim's family and facilitated by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, with specific allegations against Leon Black. The email describes forced sexual acts, travel to Epstein's properties, and the involvement of other individuals like Dana Chasin and Larry Summers.

persons.name: Jeanne M. Christensen
persons.context: The sender of the email, providing detailed background on a victim's case involving allegations against Leon Black, Jeffrey Epstein, and others. She is communicating with another attorney or colleague.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Described as a 'VIP' and 'special friend of Jeffrey's'. The victim was allegedly told to perform sexual acts for him, including an incident involving large adult sex toys that caused injury.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the abuse allegations. The victim was allegedly sent to his properties, and he reacted with anger when she was injured by Leon Black.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly involved in the abuse scheme, meeting the victim and her sister in a Florida hotel room to give approval. Reacted with anger when the victim was injured.

persons.name: Dana Chasin
persons.context: Connected to Rockefeller. Allegedly flew the victim to NYC on a small prop plane, leading to a meeting with Larry Summers. Also flew with the victim and another person on another occasion.

persons.name: Larry Summers
persons.context: Allegedly had sex with the victim during her first trip to NYC, which was facilitated by Dana Chasin.

connections.description: Described as 'special friends'. Black is characterized as a 'VIP' because of this friendship.
Acted together in the alleged abuse scheme, both reacting with anger when the victim was injured.
Chasin facilitated travel for the victim to Epstein's NYC townhouse via his plane.
Chasin's facilitation of travel led to the victim meeting and having sex with Larry Summers.
Christensen is the attorney for the victim, having built trust over months to learn the background of the case.

events.title: Victim's abuse by Leon Black in NYC
events.description: The victim was allegedly brought to Epstein's NYC townhouse, dressed specially for Leon Black, and was injured by Black's use of large adult sex toys, causing bleeding. She was scolded by Epstein, Maxwell, and her parents for 'ruining their weekend'.

events.title: First flight to NYC with Dana Chasin
events.description: The victim was flown to NYC on Dana Chasin's small prop plane, where she subsequently had sex with Larry Summers at Epstein's townhouse.

events.title: Meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell in Florida
events.description: The victim (age 15) and her younger sister (age 12) were brought to a Florida hotel room to meet separately with Ghislaine Maxwell for approval before the victim was sent to live at an unnamed person's house.

events.title: Attorney email communication
events.description: Jeanne M. Christensen sends an email to a colleague providing critical background on her client's case ahead of a Friday afternoon event.

locations: 85 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY 10003 (Wigdor LLP office)
keyFacts: The victim's biological mother allegedly forced her and her younger sister to perform sexual acts with adult men from a very young age, with the paternal grandfather also involved.

Leon Black was described to the victim as a 'VIP' and 'special friend of Jeffrey's', and she was allegedly instructed to perform sexual acts for him, resulting in a severe injury that caused bleeding.
The victim's first trip to Epstein's NYC townhouse involved flying on Dana Chasin's small prop plane, after which she had sex with Larry Summers.
Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly met the victim and her sister in a Florida hotel room to give approval before the victim was sent to live at an associate's house.
The victim documented an incident in her scrapbook at age 16, writing 'I ruined their weekend' after being scolded for her injury during the encounter with Leon Black.
